Selections

Expand selection:

‚Üë up: (*shortcut: u)
//expand 10 up
‚Üì down: (*shortcut: d)
//expand 10 down

üß≠ Flower of the winds :

east (e),
west (w),
north (n),
south (s)

Compass doesn't work?
remove any brushes, if you accidentally have set one on it (look in brushes section)
or toggle:
/navwand

üßº Remove selection:

//sel

Select in polygon mode:

//sel poly

Set selection points by viewfinder:

//pos1
//pos2

Outset & inset:

expands or shrinks selection in the circumference
//outset 5
//inset 5
parameters:

-h : only horizontal ‚Üê‚Üí
-v : only vertical ‚Üï

Toggle selection visualization:

on/off
/wesv toggle

Toggle clipboard visualization:

on/off
/wesv toggle clipboard

Designate the middle of selection:

places the red wool in the middle of the selection
//center 35:14

Selection list:

//sel list

Place reference block:

/up 0
